sense.gloss: to challenge to (a fight, game, etc.), to throw down the gauntlet, to contend for
to tackle (e.g. a problem), to attempt, to go after (a prize, record, etc.)
to pressure (someone) for sex, to make advances to

sdata.j: ↑仏↑↓ふつ↓↑政府↑↓せいふ↓は↑国家↑↓こっか↓↑予算↑↓よさん↓の↑帳尻↑↓ちょうじり↓を↑合↑↓あ↓わせるよう↑納税↑↓のうぜい↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓に|↑挑↑↓いど↓む|オンラインゲームを↑売↑↓う↓り↑出↑↓だ↓した。
sdata.e: The French government has launched an online game that challenges taxpayers to balance the national budget.
